attributes.name: documentationUrl
attributes.description: An HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Service Provider's human consumable help documentation.

attributes.name: patch
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies PATCH configuration options. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: bulk
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies BULK configuration options. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: maxOperations
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum number of operations. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: maxPayloadSize
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum payload size in bytes. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies FILTER options. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: maxResults
subAttributes.description: Integer value specifying the maximum number of Resources returned in a response. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: changePassword
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies Change Password configuration options. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies Sort configuration options. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: etag
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies Etag configuration options. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: authenticationSchemes
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies supported Authentication Scheme properties. Instead of the standard Canonical Values for type, this attribute defines the following Canonical Values to represent common schemes: oauth, oauth2, oauthbearertoken, httpbasic, and httpdigest.  To enable seamless discovery of configuration, the Service Provider SHOULD, with the appropriate security considerations, make the authenticationSchemes attribute publicly accessible without prior authentication. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The common authentication scheme name; e.g., HTTP Basic. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A description of the Authentication Scheme. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: specUrl
subAttributes.description: A HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's specification. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: documentationUrl
subAttributes.description: A HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's usage documentation. REQUIRED.
